name: Cat Escape (denizaxd)
description:
An endless runner game with shooting feature. 
-Move with the W, A, D keys and click the button to fire.

Made with free assets available in Unity Asset Store:

Sweet Land GUI – For UI Elements
https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/gui/sweet-land-gui-208285

Cartoon Cat (I changed little bit the cat’s fur)
https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/characters/animals/mammals/cartoon-cat-70180

Free Low Poly Desert Pack
https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/environments/free-low-poly-desert-pack-106709

Cross_Plains - Lowpoly Environment by Unvik_3D
https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/environments/landscapes/cross-plains-lowpoly-environment-by-unvik-3d-203644

-This game is actually suitable for android platforms. It is translated into WEBGL.
